channel.title: Equinox - 317 server
channel.description:
[center] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M7MqVYnP5HU[/youtube] [b]Quick Join [/b][b]Homepage:[/b] http://equinox-online.org [b]Forums:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/forums [b]Play Now(webclient):[/b] http://equinox-online.org/playnow.html [b]Downloadable Client:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/downloadnow.html
You can find more server links and information in the last paragraph. [b] For Whom[/b] Are you new with RuneScape private servers or are you looking for a new challenging server? Equinox is the one for you!
[b]Why Us[/b] With all our previous experience with RuneScape private servers like; JVM Company, OSO(Old School Online) and Equinox PVP with daily 300-800 players online, are we the upcomming number one. We do everything to make our players happy, we always do our best. We look at the suggestions on the forums, and in most cases, we carry them out.
[b] Why Now[/b] Equinox Online is a brand new server, if you start right now. Then you are for sure one of the best players in the game before more people will join. Right now we do not have much money to advertise Equinox, from the 16th of August there will be a huge difference. We will start advertise at that time, and we will do it big.
[b]Features[/b] Like before, there will be much features be added in the future. Right now, we do have already some really awesome features that other servers not have. They will be listed below;
- Basic Hunter - 100% Duel Arena(no dupes glitches or anything 100% staking) - 100% Pest Control - 100% Warrior Guild - 100% Party Room - Perfect Summoning - Perfect Player & NPC Clipping(not more through walls) - Perfect combat system (flawless PK) - Autocast in prayer book - High XP rate(you can choose at start ::pure included if chosen) - DDoS Server protection - Encrypted character files(to protect our players) - Great community forum - Less donator features(but still some) - No lag at all - Investments in server developers - Perfect item switching(great for hybridders) - Ofcourse 24/7 online
[i]We have much and much more features, just to much to list them up here. We can suggest just to take a look at our server and you will not regret it.[/i]
[b]Media[/b] Keep in your mind, that the server is brand new. We have just taken some pictures with no people playing. [url=http://runezone.com/][img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/10020/ss%20(2012-12-04%20at%2005.png[/img][/url][br /] [url=http://runezone.com/][img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/10020/ss%20(2012-12-04%20at%2006(2).jpg[/img][/url][br /] [url=http://runezone.com/][img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/10020/ss%20(2012-12-04%20at%2005(1).png[/img][/url][br /] [url=http://runezone.com/][img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/10020/ss%20(2012-12-04%20at%2005.jpg[/img][/url][br /] [url=http://runezone.com/][img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/10020/ss%20(2012-12-04%20at%2006(1).jpg[/img][/url]
[i]Much more screenshots and other media will follow later.[/i]
[b]Server Information[/b] [b]Homepage:[/b] http://equinox-online.org [b]Forums:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/forums [b]Play Now(webclient)[/b]: http://equinox-online.org/playnow.html [b]Downloadable Client:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/downloadnow.html [b]Staff Appeal:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/appeal.php [b]Donate:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/donate.html [b]Vote for a reward:[/b] http://equinox-online.org/vote.php
[i][b]End On behalf of the Equinox staff team, we really do hope that you will join! At least give it a chance. Our staff is always there to help you. And maybe, some day. You will become a part of the staff. [/b][/i][/center]

item.title: Equinox - 317 server
item.dc:creator: @CrzyLexii CrzyLexii
item.description:
@CrzyLexii wrote:

We are working on the hitsplats becoming full with the sword. And it may be typical but we also have a few things other 317’s don’t. You just have to come play and find out We can’t reveal all the good stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Equinox - 317 server
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

For some reason hitsplats the aren’t complete and don’t have the sword dont make me want to play. It’s one of my pet peeves. Anyways, I guess good luck.
Your economy (prices etc.) look a little wack.

Read full topic

item.title: Equinox - 317 server
item.dc:creator: @CrzyLexii CrzyLexii
item.description:
@CrzyLexii wrote:

[center]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M7MqVYnP5HU[/youtube]
Quick Join
Homepage: http://equinox-online.org
Forums: http://equinox-online.org/forums
Play Now(webclient): http://equinox-online.org/playnow.html
Downloadable Client: http://equinox-online.org/downloadnow.html

You can find more server links and information in the last paragraph.

For Whom
Are you new with RuneScape private servers or are you looking for a new challenging server?
Equinox is the one for you!

Why Us
With all our previous experience with RuneScape private servers like; JVM Company, OSO(Old School Online) and Equinox PVP with daily 300-800 players online, are we the upcomming number one.
We do everything to make our players happy, we always do our best. We look at the suggestions on the forums, and in most cases, we carry them out.


Why Now
Equinox Online is a brand new server, if you start right now. Then you are for sure one of the best players in the game before more people will join. Right now we do not have much money to advertise Equinox, from the 16th of August there will be a huge difference. We will start advertise at that time, and we will do it big.

Features
Like before, there will be much features be added in the future. Right now, we do have already some really awesome features that other servers not have.
They will be listed below;

  • Basic Hunter
  • 100% Duel Arena(no dupes glitches or anything 100% staking)
  • 100% Pest Control
  • 100% Warrior Guild
  • 100% Party Room
  • Perfect Summoning
  • Perfect Player & NPC Clipping(not more through walls)
  • Perfect combat system (flawless PK)
  • Autocast in prayer book
  • High XP rate(you can choose at start ::pure included if chosen)
  • DDoS Server protection
  • Encrypted character files(to protect our players)
  • Great community forum
  • Less donator features(but still some)
  • No lag at all
  • Investments in server developers
  • Perfect item switching(great for hybridders)
  • Ofcourse 24/7 online

We have much and much more features, just to much to list them up here. We can suggest just to take a look at our server and you will not regret it.

Media
Keep in your mind, that the server is brand new. We have just taken some pictures with no people playing.
[br /]
[br /]
[br /]
[br /]

Much more screenshots and other media will follow later.

Server Information
Homepage: http://equinox-online.org
Forums: http://equinox-online.org/forums
Play Now(webclient): http://equinox-online.org/playnow.html
Downloadable Client: http://equinox-online.org/downloadnow.html
Staff Appeal: http://equinox-online.org/appeal.php
Donate: http://equinox-online.org/donate.html
Vote for a reward: http://equinox-online.org/vote.php

End
On behalf of the Equinox staff team, we really do hope that you will join! At least give it a chance.
Our staff is always there to help you. And maybe, some day. You will become a part of the staff.
[/center]
